node.text:
A weekend that starts with a hearty brunch is bound to be a great one! The Raviz Kovalam brunch spread has something for everyone, be it savory, sweet, coffee, alcohol and more. The best meal of the week is always kept aside for Sundays!

For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
